#include <stdio.h> 

unsigned int factorial(int i) ;

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
    int number ;

    setbuf(stdout,NULL);	//display infomation when use eclipse debug
    scanf("%d",&number) ;
    
    //factorial(number) ;
    printf("factorial = %d\n", factorial(number)) ;

    return 0 ;
}

unsigned int factorial(int i)
{
    int ans ;
    if(i > 0)
    {
        printf("i = %d\n", i ) ;
        ans = i * factorial(i-1) ;
    }
    else
    {
        ans = 1 ;
        //printf("string\n") ;
    }
    return ans ;
}
}}}
